duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical expertise for all Identity Lifecycle management projects in complex network environments, including sustaining existing IAM/IDM SSO services.
Lead the evaluation, design, and development of IAM technical requirements for ForgeRock suit.
Support the regular development of IAM program roadmap and technical integrations for IAM services, including connectors and SSO implementations.
Understand client requirements, propose better solutions, and lead hands-on IAM implementation using ForgeRock.
Compile, analyze, and summarize data post-issue to ensure effective resolution.
Collaborate with a team to provide expertise and support for external identities such as B2B and B2C.
